child.name: ituArcStateAndStatusList
child.description:
See supporting document SD1-8_encodingX731M3100.

This attribute has multiplicity 0..1

This attribute is optional
child.label: ituArcStateAndStatusList

child.name: reversionMode
child.description:
This attribute identifies whether the switch is revertive or not. The default value depends on the protection group implementation

This attribute has multiplicity 0..1

This attribute is optional
child.label: reversionMode

child.name: protectionSchemeState
child.description:
This attribute identifies the state in which the protection scheme is in. FORCED_OR_LOCKED_OUT indicates that the entire group is locked; partial locking is indicated by AUTOMATIC. Individual locks can be reported through transmission parameters on the appropriate TPs.

This attribute has multiplicity 0..1

This attribute is optional
child.label: protectionSchemeState

child.name: asapRef
child.description:
This attribute indicates the assignment of an Alarm Severity Assignement Profile (ASAP) to the Protection Group.

This attribute has multiplicity 0..1

This attribute is passed by value

This attribute is optional
child.label: asapRef
